content:
The open hours of the pantries in Berkshire County are as follows:

* Adams Visitor Center: 12:30 – 1:30 p.m. on the 4th Friday of the month
* Claire Teague Senior Center: 1 – 3 p.m. on the 2nd Wednesday of the month
* Lee Council on Aging: 12 p.m. on the 2nd Wednesday of the month
* Lenox Community Center: 11:30 a.m. – 12:30 p.m. on the 2nd Wednesday of the month
* Mary Spitzer Center: 12:30 – 1:30 p.m. on the 4th Friday of the month
* Otis Town Hall: 11 a.m. – 12 p.m. on the 3rd Friday of the month
* Ralph J. Froio Senior Center: 10:30 – 11:30 a.m. on the 4th Friday of the month
* Heaton Court: 11 a.m. – 12 p.m. on the 2nd Wednesday of the month.

Please note that these are the specified open hours for the monthly distribution events at these locations. It is possible that the locations may have different hours of operation for other services or programs. It is best to contact the specific location for more information.
